content:
mCODE IG is getting these build warning just after "Generating Summary Outputs":

extension code doesn't follow canonical pattern: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/mcode/StructureDefinition/mcode-radiotherapy-modality
extension code doesn't follow canonical pattern: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/mcode/StructureDefinition/mcode-radiotherapy-technique

I can't see how these extensions are any different than any other extension that don't get a warning. Any ideas?

that's a note to me, not a thing in the QA file, and it's telling me one of my assumptions is invalid. I'm not sure what I'm doing there either. But I don't see how that's something to worry about (for you, at least)
